articles.title: 2026 Valentine’s Day Gift Guide: 26 perfect presents for your partner
articles.title_tr: 2026 Valentine’s Day Gift Guide: 26 perfect presents for your partner
articles.summary:
Whether they're outdoor enthusiasts, die-hard gamers, audiophiles, cinephiles, or anything in between, you can give your love something that they love.

articles.title: Erdoğan: Türkiye ile Mısır ikili ticaret hacminde hedef 15 milyar dolar
articles.title_tr: Erdoğan: Türkiye ile Mısır ikili ticaret hacminde hedef 15 milyar dolar
articles.summary: Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan, Mısır'ın Türkiye'nin Afrika'daki en büyük ticaret ortağı olduğunu belirterek, iki ülke arasındaki ticaret hacmini 15 milyar dolara çıkarmayı hedeflediklerini söyledi.

articles.title: Ekrem İmamoğlu ve 3 isim hakkında siyasi casusluk davası
articles.title_tr: Ekrem İmamoğlu ve 3 isim hakkında siyasi casusluk davası
articles.summary: Ekrem İmamoğlu, Necati Özkan, Hüseyin Gün ve Merdan Yanardağ hakkında “siyasal casusluk” suçlamasıyla iddianame hazırlandı. 4 şüpheli hakkında 20'şer yıla kadar hapis cezası istendi.

articles.title: The overlooked nutrition risk of Ozempic and Wegovy
articles.title_tr: The overlooked nutrition risk of Ozempic and Wegovy
articles.summary: Popular weight-loss drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy can dramatically curb appetite, but experts warn many users are flying blind when it comes to nutrition. New research suggests people taking these medications may not be getting enough guidance on protein, vitamins, and overall diet quality, increasing the risk of muscle loss and nutrient deficiencies.
articles.summary_tr: Popular weight-loss drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy can dramatically curb appetite, but experts warn many users are flying blind when it comes to nutrition. New research suggests people taking these medications may not be getting enough guidance on protein, vitamins, and overall diet quality, increasing the risk of muscle loss and nutrient deficiencies.
articles.long_summary: Popular weight-loss drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy can dramatically curb appetite, but experts warn many users are flying blind when it comes to nutrition. New research suggests people taking these medications may not be getting enough guidance on protein, vitamins, and overall diet quality, increasing the risk of muscle loss and nutrient deficiencies.
articles.long_summary_tr: Popular weight-loss drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy can dramatically curb appetite, but experts warn many users are flying blind when it comes to nutrition. New research suggests people taking these medications may not be getting enough guidance on protein, vitamins, and overall diet quality, increasing the risk of muscle loss and nutrient deficiencies.

articles.title: Garanti BBVA’nın 2025 finansal sonuçları belli oldu
articles.title_tr: Garanti BBVA’nın 2025 finansal sonuçları belli oldu
articles.summary: Garanti BBVA, 31 Aralık 2025 tarihli konsolide finansal sonuçlarına göre yılı 111 milyar 262 milyon TL net kârla tamamlarken, aktif büyüklüğünü 4 trilyon 547 milyar TL seviyesine taşıdı. Banka, nakdi ve gayri nakdi krediler aracılığıyla ekonomiye sağladığı desteği 3 trilyon 489 milyar TL’ye çıkarırken, müşteri mevduatları yıllık yüzde 50 artışla 3 trilyon 143 milyar TL’ye ulaştı. Güçlü sermaye yapısını koruyan Garanti BBVA’nın sermaye yeterlilik oranı yüzde 17,5 olarak gerçekleşti.

articles.title: You Can Dig Out Your Nintendo Labo VR Kit To Play Virtual Boy On Switch Online
articles.title_tr: You Can Dig Out Your Nintendo Labo VR Kit To Play Virtual Boy On Switch Online
articles.summary: While playing Virtual Boy games on Nintendo Switch Online will require a pricey peripheral, you may already have something that lets you play them. More specifically, the Nintendo Labo VR Kit has gotten new functionality nearly seven years after its release.Nintendo Treehouse staff member Corey Olcsvary revealed this to GamesBeat at a recent press event. He explained that Nintendo isn't promoting this functionality as it's no longer selling new Nintendo Lab VR Kits. It's the cheapest way to experience this new Nintendo Classics catalog, at least if you haven't thrown out or given away your Nintendo Labo products.          If you don't remember Nintendo Labo VR Kit, it was part of a line of funky peripherals Nintendo released early on in the Switch's lifespan. They were all made of cardboard, had to be put together by the player, and had functionality with some exclusive games.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Türk yatırımları, Mısır’da 3 milyar doları aştı
articles.title_tr: Türk yatırımları, Mısır’da 3 milyar doları aştı
articles.summary: Mısır –Türkiye İş Formu’nda konuşan DEİK Başkanı Nail Olpak, Türk iş insanları da son dönemde bölgedeki yatırımlarını hızlandırdığını belirterek, “Bugün Mısır’da 3 milyar doların üzerine çıkan ve 100 bin kişiye istihdam sağlıyor. Hedefimiz ticaret hacmini makul bir sürede 15 milyar dolara çıkarmak” dedi.

articles.title: Haluk Eyidoğan'dan korkutan deprem uyarısı: Sadece İstanbul'u değil, bütün Marmara'yı vuracak
articles.title_tr: Haluk Eyidoğan'dan korkutan deprem uyarısı: Sadece İstanbul'u değil, bütün Marmara'yı vuracak
articles.summary: Deprem uzmanı Prof. Dr. Haluk Eyidoğan, Marmara Denizi’nde beklenen büyük depremin yalnızca İstanbul’u değil, Marmara’ya kıyısı bulunan tüm illeri etkileyeceğine dikkat çekti. Bu nedenle sürecin “İstanbul depremi” olarak değil, bölgesel etkileri göz önünde bulundurularak “Marmara depremi” şeklinde ele alınması gerektiğini vurguladı.

articles.title: Roadside Research Invades Early Access Later This Month
articles.title_tr: Roadside Research Invades Early Access Later This Month
articles.summary: Aliens have been invading Earth in video games for decades, but Roadside Research's visitors from another may be staging the most ridiculous invasion while posing as gas station attendants. Now, Roadside Research is heading into early access, and these aliens are paving the way for a larger incursion force. Developer Cybernetic Walrus and publisher Oro Interactive have announced that Roadside Research will hit early access on February 12. As you can see in the trailer below, these aliens aren't exactly masters of disguise. They don't bother to hide their alien limbs, and putting paper pictures over their faces isn't exactly hiding their true nature. Luckily for them, most of the humans they're observing aren't much brighter.          Players shouldn't get too complacent when attending to their duties at the gas station. Humans can and will suspect players are aliens if they screw up too much. Attracting too much attention will only lead Agent Mulder-like feds checking out the gas station and poking around where they don't belong.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: A 25-year study found an unexpected link between cheese and dementia
articles.title_tr: A 25-year study found an unexpected link between cheese and dementia
articles.summary: A massive Swedish study tracking nearly 28,000 people for 25 years found an unexpected link between full-fat dairy and brain health. Among adults without a genetic risk for Alzheimer’s, eating more full-fat cheese was associated with a noticeably lower risk of developing the disease, while higher cream intake was tied to reduced dementia risk overall. The findings challenge decades of low-fat dietary advice but come with important caveats.
articles.summary_tr: A massive Swedish study tracking nearly 28,000 people for 25 years found an unexpected link between full-fat dairy and brain health. Among adults without a genetic risk for Alzheimer’s, eating more full-fat cheese was associated with a noticeably lower risk of developing the disease, while higher cream intake was tied to reduced dementia risk overall. The findings challenge decades of low-fat dietary advice but come with important caveats.

The findings challenge decades of low-fat dietary advice but come with important caveats.

The findings challenge decades of low-fat dietary advice but come with important caveats.

articles.title: GTA 6 Was Revealed Four Years Ago Today
articles.title_tr: GTA 6 Was Revealed Four Years Ago Today
articles.summary: February 4 is a special day in the history of Grand Theft Auto, as it was on this day four years ago that Rockstar first publicly acknowledged the existence of Grand Theft Auto VI.The company said on February 4, 2022 that "the next entry in the series is underway," though it did not specifically mention the game's name or any other core details.The next major development for GTA 6 came not from Rockstar or Take-Two, but as part of a massive leak in September 2022 that showed off an early version of the game and its setting. Within days of the leak coming to light, the supposed perpetrator appeared in court and was held in a youth detention center. The leak was huge, revealing the game's setting of Vice City, and that it would feature two main characters. It also revealed that GTA 6 could feature sex robots and alligators.Continue Reading at GameSpot

Within days of the leak coming to light, the supposed perpetrator appeared in court and was held in a youth detention center. articles.title: Şi'den Rusya'ya birlikte hareket etme çağrısı
articles.title_tr: Şi'den Rusya'ya birlikte hareket etme çağrısı
articles.summary: Çin Devlet Başkanı Şi Cinping, ABD'nin Başkan Donald Trump'ın yeni iktidar döneminde egemenlik talepleri ve müdahale tehditleriyle jeopolitik dengeleri sarstığı bir dönemde Rusya'ya sorumlu büyük güçler olarak birlikte hareket etme çağrısında bulundu.
articles.summary_tr: Çin Devlet Başkanı Şi Cinping, ABD'nin Başkan Donald Trump'ın yeni iktidar döneminde egemenlik talepleri ve müdahale tehditleriyle jeopolitik dengeleri sarstığı bir dönemde Rusya'ya sorumlu büyük güçler olarak birlikte hareket etme çağrısında bulundu.

articles.title: Amazon.com, geliştirilmiş yapay zeka destekli Alexa'yı ABD'de kullanıma sundu
articles.title_tr: Amazon.com, geliştirilmiş yapay zeka destekli Alexa'yı ABD'de kullanıma sundu
articles.summary: Amazon.com  Inc, geliştirilmiş yapay zeka destekli Alexa’yı ABD’de Prime abonelerine sunarken, tüm kullanıcılar için sınırlı ücretsiz bir versiyon da başlattı.
